statements: SELECT * FROM spending_habits WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category, amount FROM spending_habits WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT id, category FROM spending_habits WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, date, amount FROM spending_habits ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spending_habits GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, category, amount, date FROM spending_habits WHERE category='Food' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM spending_habits WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM spending_habits WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY category, date;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spending_habits GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM spending_habits WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM spending_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending > 1000;
SELECT spending_category, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending < 5000 ORDER BY total_spending ASC;
SELECT area_name, potential_savings FROM cost_cutting_areas WHERE potential_savings >= 5000 ORDER BY potential_savings DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending > 10000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT report_name, spending_category, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE spending_category = 'Marketing' ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT area_name, potential_savings FROM cost_cutting_areas WHERE potential_savings > 5000 ORDER BY potential_savings DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_spending, spending_category FROM spending_reports WHERE spending_category = 'Operations' AND total_spending > 20000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC, report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM spending_habits ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) FROM spending_habits GROUP BY category;
SELECT user_id, category, amount FROM spending_habits WHERE transaction_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT area_name, description FROM cost_cutting_areas WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM spending_habits WHERE category = 'food' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spending_habits GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, category, transaction_date FROM spending_habits WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.feedback, f.submission_date FROM user_feedback u JOIN user_feedback f ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE u.feedback LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY submission_date ASC;

SELECT c.area_name, COUNT(u.user_id) AS total_users FROM cost_cutting_areas c LEFT JOIN spending_habits s ON c.area_id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN user_feedback u ON s.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY c.area_name ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM spending_habits GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT u.username, c.category_name, sh.amount_spent FROM users u INNER JOIN spending_habits sh ON u.user_id = sh.user_id INNER JOIN categories c ON sh.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM users u LEFT JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT category_name, SUM(amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM categories c INNER JOIN spending_habits sh ON c.category_id = sh.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, r.report_date FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN reports r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;

SELECT c.category_name, cc.area_name, cc.potential_savings FROM categories c JOIN cost_cutting_areas cc ON c.category_id = cc.category_id WHERE cc.potential_savings > 500 ORDER BY cc.potential_savings DESC;
SELECT r.report_id, u.username, r.spending_score FROM reports r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.spending_score < 50 ORDER BY r.report_id ASC;
